idiom.meaning: Contentment with what one has brings happiness
idiom.example: Despite modest circumstances, the family found contentment in simple pleasures and each other's company

shortDescription: Laozi's profound insight in the 'Dao De Jing' teaches that knowing contentment (知足) leads to lasting happiness (常乐).
